title: Is Fifty Shades of Grey being made into a movie? - Quora

response.answer_text: The movie rights were acquired by Universal and Focus Features in March, 2012. (http://www.deadline.com/2012/03/universal-pictures-and-focus-features-win-50-shades-of-grey/) Whether that will ever come to fruition is another story.  Lack of storyline is not a problem. Hollywood is renowned for completely deviating from whatever the originating book put forth. They can just make a storyline up!
That's what screenwriters are for.   Don't you worry your pretty little head or other more relevant parts of your body.   They'll come up with some sort of story.
